title: 158: How to Sustain Your Motivation
description:
How do you stay motivated and sustain that motivation over a day, week, month, and a year?

When I’m thinking about 2020, I’m thinking of vision, eyesight, having clear objectives and goals.

In this special New Year episode, I’m going to share with you the 3 steps to gain motivation and keep it so you can make 2020 the best year yet. 

** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. **
